feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:28 a.m. ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 10:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NE 41 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
